changeSet.author: gabriel.milioli
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO music_genre (id, description) SELECT x.id, x.description FROM ( values (1, 'Pop'), (2, 'Rock'), (3, 'Hip Hop'), (4, 'Jazz'), (5, 'Classical'), (6, 'Electronic'), (7, 'Country'), (8, 'R&B'), (9, 'Reggae'), (10, 'Blues') ) as x (id, description) WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM music_genre i WHERE i.id = x.id)
